description.displayText: Liz was part of our family from 2000 to 2002. She was an outstanding baby sitter for our children; always on the top of homework, soccer practices schedule and bed time. She is highly recommended.
description.originalText: Liz was part of our family from 2000 to 2002. She was an outstanding baby sitter for our children; always on the top of homework, soccer practices schedule and bed time. She is highly recommended.

description.displayText: Liz is a friend and she teaches a knitting class that my daughter takes and absolutely loves. My experience with Liz is that she is patient, loving, very kind and super creative. Children adore her and fully enjoy her classes. I have been amazed at the things that the children have made in her class. I also know Liz's child very well.  She spends time at my house with my daughter. Her child is very well behaved and well mannered. This says a lot for the mother!
description.originalText: Liz is a friend and she teaches a knitting class that my daughter takes and absolutely loves. description.displayText: Liz was both my girls' babysitter/nanny for many years. She watched my older daughter (now 10) from when she was 2 1/2 for summers (and any other school days off, on weekends, etc.) and my younger daughter (now almost 7) from when she was 4 months old - full time until she was about 3 1/2 and then on school days off, summer holidays, etc. My children refer to Liz as "Mama Dos."  She was not a babysitter; she was truly like a second mother! The warmth, care and talent that she displays is unparalleled. She's originally from Argentina so is overtly loving and gregarious. (I remember the first day I met her - at her home when I went to interview her to watch my older daughter. She insisted I come for breakfast. When she opened the front door, she hugged and kissed me. This is Liz.) She's also a very talented artist, weaver and crafts person and she inspires creativity in children with outings, art projects and other exploration. She's easygoing and my children adored her. When I had family emergencies, etc., my children stayed with her in her home for extended periods of time. Liz has two of  her own school-aged children who are also lovely. If you're looking for someone to not only care for your child(ren) but to nurture them and foster their growth, Liz is amazing!
